title: Rematch (Part 1)
body:
Rematch (Part 1)

"You bastard you are a B rank hunter" death lord shouted the moment he appeared and saw Evan.

Evan was taken aback when he heard what death lord shouted and looked at him with a blank expression on his face

'B rank hunter' Evan thought and looked behind him wondering if a B rank hunter is standing there but didn't find anyone.

"Are you talking to me?" Evan asked death lord when he did not find anyone behind him.

"There are just two of us so, of course, I am talking to you"

Evan was speechless and he didn't know what to say. He is just a D rank hunter and was already having a headache when people in VR were calling him a C+ rank hunter who is harassing C rank hunters.

Like this is not enough now this guy is calling him a B rank hunter.
